sentences.english: Thenceforth, M. Madeleine was transfigured in Fantine's eyes.

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the chemopreventive effect of arotinoid ethylster and its mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨芳维甲酸乙酯肿瘤预防的作用及机理。

sentences.english: This paper reviews the recent advance in heteroaromatic molecular tweezers involving multiple hydrogen-bonding sites.

sentences.english: The report includes the first examples of N -oxide arylation with equimolar ratios of the two coupling partners.
sentences.chinese: 纪事第一例子氮氧化物的摩尔比率芳与耦合两个伙伴。

sentences.english: After the recovery of visual acuity, deemed hopeless, Fang often tears.
sentences.chinese: 后，被认定视力恢复无望时，芳便经常以泪洗面。

sentences.english: But the aromatization reactivity of the catalysts will be inhibited if they contain too much sulfate sulfur.
sentences.chinese: 硫酸盐硫含量太高将大大降低催化剂的芳构化活性。

sentences.english: Ms. Tang admits that her social life centers on her fellow teachers.
sentences.chinese: 唐国芳承认，她的社交生活主要就是与同事在一起。
